FuncDef: This command monitors scheduler statistics for a SAP encap-group.
CLIs: sap <sap-id> [ scheduler <scheduler-name> ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]
sap <sap-id> encap-group <group-name> [ member <encap-id> ] [ scheduler <scheduler-name> ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Displays statistics for the encap group up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the value of the encap-id to be displayed. Values-0 to 16777215.

Specifies an existing scheduler-name. Scheduler names are configured in the config>qos>scheduler-policy>tier level context. This parameter is mandatory if the SAP resides on a LAG in adapt-qoslink or port-fair mode. Values-An existing scheduler-name is in the form of a string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters..
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
